item.description: This night's show will be Leon's annual Christmas "Red" party and is open to the general public...they ask but one thing, there's no cover charge, but all are asked to bring a new unwrapped toy to benefit the Toy Closet at Yale-New Haven Children's Hospital...and wear something "red"!!!  Party kicks off at 9:00 PM with complimentary Hors D'oeuvres, and they're gonna be tasty ones, cuz Leon's has a well deserved reputation as one of the best Italian restaurants in the Elm City...The Bernadettes then commence with the booty shakin' portion of the evening!!!  Last years show was incredible as hundreds turned out to feast on some might tasty hors d'oeuvres and boogey the night away...so many toys were collected that extra trucks had to be called in, along with police to help out with traffic on Long Wharf...we wanna see another night like that again!!!  It's been a while since we last performed at Leon's, looking forward to our return there, and putting the call out there to many of our friends and fans to come on out and support this cause!  For more info about Leon's, visit their website at:http://www.leonsrestaurant.com/

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The Red Party @ Leon's featuring The Bernadette's
